sentences.en: Applications should be addressed to: The business affairs editor.
sentences.cn: 申请表应寄给；商务编辑。

sentences.en: Cookery Editor Moyra Fraser takes you behind the scenes.
sentences.cn: 烹调专栏主笔莫伊拉·弗雷泽会带您了解幕后的故事。

sentences.en: He began his career as a sound editor.
sentences.cn: 他是从声音剪辑师做起的。

sentences.en: He was the highest-paid sub-editor in Fleet Street.
sentences.cn: 他是英国报界薪水最高的副编辑。

sentences.en: I think he was born to be editor of a tabloid newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他天生就是当小报编辑的料。

sentences.en: I was a sub-editor on the foreign desk of the News Chronicle.
sentences.cn: 我是《新闻纪事报》国际组的一名助理编辑。

sentences.en: I was promoted to editor and then editorial director.
sentences.cn: 我先是被提升为编辑，然后又晋升为编务总监。

sentences.en: Keith Vass, editor, denies he had inside knowledge.
sentences.cn: 编辑基思·瓦斯否认他知道内部消息。

sentences.en: Michael Rosen is the editor of the anthology.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔·罗森是这本选集的编者。

sentences.en: Prue invited the magazine's editor to lunch and made her pitch.
sentences.cn: 普吕邀请该杂志的编辑共进午餐，推销自己的点子。

sentences.en: She worked at 20th Century Fox as a film editor.
sentences.cn: 她在20世纪福克斯公司担任电影剪辑师。

sentences.en: She's the literary editor of the "Sunday Review".
sentences.cn: 她是《星期天评论》的文学编辑。

sentences.en: The Editor can give no guarantee that they will fulfil their obligations.
sentences.cn: 《编辑家》无法保证他们会履行职责.

sentences.en: the editor of a book of essays on modern poetry
sentences.cn: 现代诗歌论文集的编者

sentences.en: the editor of the Daily Telegraph
The Editor takes a cavalier attitude to the concept of fact checking.
sentences.cn: 《编辑》杂志对于核对事实这一点采取无所谓的态度。

sentences.en: The editor's decision is final and shall evermore remain so.
sentences.cn: 编辑的决定是最终性的，而且应该永远不会改变。

words.tran_cn: 以编辑身份地；以社论形式
编辑；校订；编辑或主笔地位
发表社论；（在报纸等的文章中）加编者按语
（就某事）发表社论；插入主观评论

phrases.tran_cn: 一个用来编辑HTML文件的编辑程序
脚本编辑器；脚本语言编辑器
文字编辑器，文本编辑器

trans.tran_cn: 主编，编辑，记者，剪辑员，编者，编辑程序
trans.tran_en: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it
